title: Vicson1
author: Vicson1
content: Bitcoin is the most beneficial cryptocurrency in the world as I have seen it change the lives of many around me for good and I am glad to begin this journey into securing a bright future with Bitcoin. But as a newbie that want to tread this path, what are the things I need to know about it? Will buying and hording for a long time profit me?

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: To benefits from bitcoin then you have to start your investment on the long term and I know too well only long term could give you a good profits. But at least if I would advise you, only invest with money your not desperate of using or money you could afford to lose maybe if market went against you although I believe it would surely bounced back but as a newbie the panic over an investment can not be hidden which causes them sell without patient. Therefore it's not too late to buy and hold as the market is still favorable to buy.All details about bitcoin is fully explained here so please mark out time to read through it.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: That the op has seen Bitcoin change the lives of so many people in the world doesn't mean that bitcoin is a quick money scheme that one can invest in and get a quick return. Understanding the volatile nature of Bitcoin will help you to choose the best investment option you need hence you have the crypto knowledge and you have the strategy to pursue your investments. Just follow the information given to you by @Adbitco I believe you will get the answers you seek and you will make a good choice of investment whether long or short term but don't expect a quick return because Bitcoin investment is not like Ponzi scheme.

comments.author: CryptoPanda
comments.body: 1. First thing you need to know is that Bitcoin isn’t a get rich quick scheme. You can lose money buying bitcoin because Bitcoin is volatile. 2. Bitcoin is the most reliable cryptocurrency there is, altcoins can be more profitable in short term but you don’t want to hodl alts for long cause they can crash anytime. 3. If you want to hodl bitcoin for long term, then the best time to buy is when the price is low and weak hands are selling.4. Use decentralized exchanges/ p2p to make bitcoin purchases.5. Lastly, do not hodl in centralized exchanges. Where you store your bitcoin is very important since you’re responsible for the safety of your coins. Any wallet you decide to use should have its private keys like we say “Not your keys Not your coins”.  Read General] Bitcoin Wallets - Which, what, why?

Do not be like those ones. Invest and wait for profit to come to you on long term.

Its a part of cycle and must be experience. Theres a lot to know more about bitcoin and youll be happy you did research on it.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Your future will be bright if you take the time to learn all the pros and cons of owning bitcoins. Many people who have acquired only a few inches of knowledge about bitcoin without knowing the whole history of its existence and have invested in it are disappointed today. I am reading that a CNBC survey shows a sharp drop in confidence in bitcoin. But if you look at all the ups and downs of Bitcoin, history shows that, in the long run, it has always regained its good reputation.Therefore, OP, knowing all the ins and outs of bitcoin as the foundation of your future should be a prerogative.

comments.author: retreat
comments.body: Welcome to the world of crypto, very happy to have you here. As someone who has been in the crypto world for several years, I have some advice for you that might be able to help you survive and maximize your profits in this market;- The first thing I did when I entered this world was find out about crypto terms and popular tokens that are worth investing in through CMC.- Invest in popular coins first, like Bitcoin or Ethereum or BNB.- Don't be FOMO and invest in coins that you are familiar with. If you want to buy a coin through an ICO, IDO, or pre-sale, make sure you first find out the background of the coin and don't invest too much.- Don't put your investment in just one type of coin and always use a crypto wallet like Metamask or Safepal to store your coins.- Crypto is not a place for you to get rich quick, if you still think that way you should stop now. You can earn money on crypto if you really take advantage of the various opportunities that exist, because there are many things that can be used and it will bring you money.- Increase interaction with the community and socialize more often. It will give you a lot of knowledge and experience.- Finally, if you want to invest in crypto, you should invest at your own risk. Nobody cares if you lose money here or the value of your assets falls. The bottom line is what you do will be your own responsibility.I hope you can understand what I said above. Good luck.

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Quote from: Vicson1 on December 05, 2022, 03:51:13 PMBut as a newbie that want to tread this path, what are the things I need to know about it? But as a beginner you may not have much knowledge with the crypto market, while hodling your bitcoin you may experience some bear market, it shouldn't discourage you about your investment  or make you panic, the bear market comes and go. You need to make your own research about bitcoin and the crypto market so that you can make good decisions to be sure if you are prepared to invest.  Don't take a rush to invest,  get some knowledge first.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: From my point of view, Bitcoin is quite affordable now, and those who can afford to invest now will see major profits in the upcoming years. However, the market is standing on a thin line, and it's likely to crash even further throughout 2023. The dollar-cost averaging (DCA) technique is useful in reducing any associated risk in such cases. This forum is generally a decent source of information; however, you'll see plenty of prediction threads in which everyone will be simply expressing their own personal opinion, which is usually not based on any statistics or valid sources, and even if it is, there are no guarantees. To sum up, if you can afford to buy bitcoin, do it little by little and try to hold them till the next bull market.

But you also have to be mentally prepared to hold, because it's going to be long and there are times that you might be tempted to sell and take the profit. But the cycle goes like you buy at bear market and then sell at bull run in order to maximized your profits.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: I surmise that when you speak of Bitcoin being the "most beneficial cryptocurrency in the world" you are talking not about its revolutionary features but its price, not about the Bitcoin that offers a decentralized monetary system but the Bitcoin as in the coin, the one that you could buy and sell for a profit. As a newbie who wants to tread this path, it would surely help if you get to know more about the technology than the next direction the price of the coin probably takes. It gives you more reason to believe and HODL. It makes your hand a lot stronger. It will help you survive the most extreme of winters.

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: Bitcoin has lost most of its value during the ongoing bear market, if you start now you can collect Bitcoin at a discount.
